title: Add automated metadata validation/testing
description:
Create automated validation for social sharing metadata to replace manual checking via metatags.io, Twitter card validator, etc.

Options to explore:
1. Playwright tests that render pages and validate metadata tags (og:, twitter:, etc.)
2. Build-time validation checking for required fields (title, description, image, etc.)
3. Schema validation for JSON-LD structured data
4. Integration with social preview APIs if available

Requirements:
- Validate all pages have required OG tags (og:title, og:description, og:image, og:url)
- Validate Twitter card tags (twitter:card, twitter:title, twitter:description, twitter:image)
- Validate image dimensions (1200x630 for OG images)
- Validate JSON-LD schema correctness
- Fail build on missing/invalid metadata

Goal: Catch metadata issues at build time rather than discovering them manually after shipping.
